properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CI_SHOW = 'Y' AND CI_STOCK > 0
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM ITEM WHERE CI_SHOW = 'Y' )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

INSERT INTO ITEM ( CI_CODE , CI_NAME , CI_CATEGORY , CI_PROVIDER , CI_PROVIDEPRICE , CI_PRICE , CI_MAINIMG , CI_STOCK , CI_SHOW ) VALUES ( 'CI' || SEQ_ITEM.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , (SELECT CI_MAINIMG FROM ITEM WHERE CI_CODE = 'CI1001') , ? , ? )
